title: Age Calculator
content: Calculate your age in years, months, and days based on your date of birth. Find out exactly how old you are down to the day.

title: BMI Calculator
content: Determine your Body Mass Index (BMI) using your height and weight. Assess if your weight is in a healthy range.

title: Loan Calculator
content: Calculate monthly payments, total interest, and amortization schedules for any type of loan, including personal, auto, or mortgages.

title: Compound Interest Calculator
content: See how your investments can grow over time with the power of compound interest. Project future balances with different contribution schedules.

title: Word and Character Counter
content: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in your text. A useful tool for writers, students, and editors.

title: Inflation Calculator
content: Calculate the buying power of money over time. See how inflation has affected the value of a certain amount from one year to another.
